plans.name: Base
plans.description: Reserve a spot for our first ever product
plans.details: Reserve your EVolve Charger with a 25 dollar deposit. When we are ready to deliver your charger, you will be entitled to 25 dollars off the final price of our first ever product.
plans.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-12 w-12 text-teal-500" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M13 10V3L4 14h7v7l9-11h-7z" /></svg>

plans.name: Deluxe
plans.description: Help EVolve the future of charging
plans.details: Be a part of the future of charging. Pay a $100 deposit now, and receive a $150 discount off the final price of our first product alongside a special token of our appreciation. Play a MASSIVE role in EVolve Charge's journey through this plan.
